lines.text: Is center of sphere that defines mirror
Principal axis passes through center of curvature and mirror’s midpoint

definitions.def: Center of sphere that defines spherical mirror.
Line that passes through center of curvature and midpoint.

secText: Some terms help us explain how to locate images formed by concave and convex mirrors.
The sphere that defines the mirror has its center at C, as we show in the diagram. This point is the center of curvature of the mirror.
The principal axis is the line that passes through the center of curvature and the midpoint of the mirror’s surface. You will use it as a reference line when you analyze mirrors.
